mapper.select: select * from COMM.PRICE_LIST where (STOP_DATE IS NULL OR STOP_DATE >=sysdate) and ( (item_code ='120400002N' and item_spec='/') or (item_code ='71AAB00007' and item_spec=#{0}) or (item_code ='71AAE00001' and item_spec=#{1}) )
select * from COMM.PRICE_LIST where (STOP_DATE IS NULL OR STOP_DATE >=sysdate) and item_code ='71AAA00001' and item_spec=#{0}

select p.price PRICE from OUTPADM.clinic_index c, OUTPADM.CLINIC_TYPE_DICT t, comm.price_list p where c.clinic_label = #{0} and c.clinic_type = t.clinic_type and (t.charge_item = p.item_code and t.clinic_item_spec = p.item_spec and t.clinic_item_units = p.units and p.stop_date is null and p.item_class = 'E')

select * from comm.price_list where item_code =(select charge_item from outpadm.clinic_type_dict where clinic_type =#{0}) and item_spec =(select clinic_type_code from outpadm.clinic_type_dict where clinic_type=#{0}) and stop_date is null
mapper.insert: insert into COMM.PRICE_LIST (ITEM_CLASS, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SPEC, UNITS, PRICE, PREFER_PRICE, FOREIGNER_PRICE, PERFORMED_BY, FEE_TYPE_MASK, CLASS_ON_INP_RCPT, CLASS_ON_OUTP_RCPT, CLASS_ON_RECKONING, SUBJ_CODE, CLASS_ON_MR, MEMO, START_DATE, STOP_DATE, OPERATOR, ENTER_DATE) values (#{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preferPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{foreignerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeTypeMask,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{classOnInpRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classOnOutpRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classOnReckoning,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classOnMr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{stopDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterDate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into COMM.PRICE_LIST
ITEM_CLASS,
ITEM_CODE,
ITEM_NAME,
ITEM_SPEC,
UNITS,
PRICE,
PREFER_PRICE,
FOREIGNER_PRICE,
PERFORMED_BY,
FEE_TYPE_MASK,
CLASS_ON_INP_RCPT,
CLASS_ON_OUTP_RCPT,
CLASS_ON_RECKONING,
SUBJ_CODE,
CLASS_ON_MR,
MEMO,
START_DATE,
STOP_DATE,
OPERATOR,
ENTER_DATE,
#{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{preferPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{foreignerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{feeTypeMask,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{classOnReckoning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
